nodes.description: 2010年，Jundullah组织在伊朗东南部清真寺发动自杀式爆炸，致28人死亡，包括革命卫队成员，伊朗称其得到美国支持
nodes.support_text: In 2010, two suicide bombers killed at least 28 people, including some of Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards, at a mosque in southeast Iran; an attack Iranian leaders said was backed by the United States.

nodes.description: 2010年，伊朗安全部门截获从阿联酋出发的极端分子
nodes.support_text: In 2010, our security services intercepted & captured extremists en route from UAE.

nodes.description: 2017年，Jaish al-Adl在Sistan and Baluchestan省发动袭击，造成10名边防警卫死亡
nodes.support_text: In 2017 that killed 10 border guards.

nodes.description: 2018年6月，伊朗革命卫队击毙Ansar al-Furqan组织领导人
nodes.support_text: In June, Iran's Revolutionary Guards said they had killed the group's suspected leader, Molavi Jalil Qanbar-Zehi, in a mountainous area of Sistan and Baluchestan.

nodes.description: 2018年10月，Jaish al-Adl绑架12名伊朗边防警卫，其中5人获释
nodes.support_text: In October, the separatist Jaish al-Adl group kidnapped 12 Iranian border guards in the remote province, five of whom have since been released.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，伊朗Chabahar警察局外发生自杀式爆炸，致3人死亡、48人受伤
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber has set off an explosion outside a police station in the Iranian southern port city of Chabahar, killing at least three people and wounding 48, state TV has reported. 'This morning a bomb inside a car exploded near a police station in Chabahar. Three people were killed and some others were injured,' Rahmdel Bameri, acting governor of Chabahar told state television, which reported the figure of 48 hurt.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，Ansar al-Furqan宣称对Chabahar爆炸负责
nodes.support_text: SITE Intelligence Group reported that Sunni militant group Ansar al-Furqan had claimed responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，Chabahar副省长报告两名警察死亡
nodes.support_text: Mohammad Hadi Marashi, deputy governor for security affairs, told state TV that two police officers were killed in the attack.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，官员称执行爆炸的恐怖分子已被击毙
nodes.support_text: An official said that 'the terrorist who carried out the attack was killed'.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，Tasnim News Agency报道爆炸导致4人死亡、4人受伤，并称妇女和儿童受伤
nodes.support_text: Four people were reportedly killed and 4 injured in a terrorist attack on Police headquarters in #Iran's southeastern city of #Chabahar: Acting Governor of #Sistan and #Baluchestan Province pic.twitter.com/sDY3ZUb31f — Tasnim News Agency (@Tasnimnews_EN) December 6, 2018

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，伊朗外交部谴责恐怖袭击，表示将追责
nodes.support_text: Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif tweeted. 'Foreign-backed terrorists kill & wound innocents in Chabahar. As we've made clear in the past, such crimes won’t go unpunished'.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，印度外交部强烈谴责袭击，承诺投资Chabahar港口项目
nodes.support_text: India has said it is ready to invest up to...

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，美国给予伊朗Chabahar港口项目制裁例外
nodes.support_text: The Indian foreign ministry strongly condemned the 'despicable terrorist attack'. 'The perpetrators behind this dastardly attack should be brought to justice expeditiously. There can be no justification for any act of terror’

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，Chabahar副省长Rahmdel Bameri向国家电视台报告爆炸事件伤亡情况
nodes.support_text: Rahmdel Bameri, acting governor of Chabahar told state television, which reported the figure of 48 hurt.

nodes.description: 2018年12月6日，Reuters news agency报道Chabahar爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: Reuters news agency reported the terrorist attack in Chabahar on December 6, 2018.

edges.support_text: Jundullah在2010年发动袭击（node_1）早于其声称事件（node_18）
In June, Iran's Revolutionary Guards said they had killed the group's suspected leader, Molavi Jalil Qanbar-Zehi, in a mountainous area of Sistan and Baluchestan.
SITE Intelligence Group reported that Sunni militant group Ansar al-Furqan had claimed responsibility for the attack.
Mohammad Hadi Marashi, deputy governor for security affairs, told state TV that two police officers were killed in the attack.
An official said that 'the terrorist who carried out the attack was killed'.

Four people were reportedly killed and 4 injured in a terrorist attack on Police headquarters in #Iran's southeastern city of #Chabahar: Acting Governor of #Sistan and #Baluchestan Province pic.twitter.com/sDY3ZUb31f — Tasnim News Agency (@Tasnimnews_EN) December 6, 2018
Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif tweeted. 'Foreign-backed terrorists kill & wound innocents in Chabahar. As we've made clear in the past, such crimes won’t go unpunished'.

The Indian foreign ministry strongly condemned the 'despicable terrorist attack'. 'The perpetrators behind this dastardly attack should be brought to justice expeditiously. There can be no justification for any act of terror’
同一场爆炸事件中，副省长首先向电视台通报信息
路透社报道了Chabahar爆炸事件（语义描述中事件发生时间为2018年12月6日）
